titles.title: Say No to Drug Ads Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for direct-to-consumer advertisements of prescription drugs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/15/2011--Introduced. Say No to Drug Ads Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for the cost of direct-to-consumer advertisement of a prescription drug.
